content:
Overwatch is an amazing game, and Baptiste is a fantastic hero! His healing abilities can be super powerful in the right situations.

With your PC specs, you should be able to play Overwatch at high graphics settings, including 4K resolution and high frame rates. The game is well-optimized, so you can expect smooth performance even in intense team fights.

Baptiste's abilities can be a bit tricky to master, but it's great that you're putting in the time to learn him. His Immortality Field can be a game-changer in team fights, and his Burst Heal can be super effective at topping off your teammates' health. Have you been playing with a specific team composition or strategy in mind?

Also, have you checked out any of the Overwatch esports events or streams? The Overwatch League is a lot of fun to watch, and you can learn a lot from the pros about strategy and hero play.

By the way, since you're interested in multiplayer games, I have to ask: have you considered checking out any of the other Blizzard games, like World of Warcraft or Heroes of the Storm? They're both great games with large player bases and a lot of depth.
